column2: "...Harkotan is a planet of opposites. If life may be granted, so too death shall leave it's mark."
"Who would've thought of recounting that sorrowful tale. I'm surprised that it was you Kotoshiro. Couldn't you left it be?"
"Honestly, how did you even manage to remember the full details of that sorrowful tale?"
"That's because it was you who recounted it to me, Sukunahime."
"Sukunahime, Was the ashen girl in that story..."
"It's a sorrowful tale, not worth being recounted. None of this planet's history bears any merit. I suggest both of you to forget it."
"I'm sorry Kotoshiro... I think I made Sukunahime angry."
"It's not your fault. Sukunahime's anger is always present, brought by the pointless conflict between the White and Black."
